cards.name: Judge
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 4 cards.

cards.name: Heavy Boots
text: If the Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is 3 or more, that Pokémon gets +20 HP and can't be Confused. (If that Pokémon is currently Confused, remove that Special Condition.)

cards.name: Houndoom Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Houndoom-EX.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Mewtwo Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Mewtwo-EX.

cards.name: Rainbow Energy
text: This card provides Colorless Energy. While in play, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Fire Fling
attacks.text: Put 3 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Hand Fling
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Protect
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

cards.name: M Houndoom-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Inferno Fang
attacks.text: You may discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Cryo Mouth
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has 10 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 150 more damage.

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Sinister Fog
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Creep Show
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has 3 or more damage counters on it, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Sleep Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

ability.name: My Way
ability.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Moonlight Gain
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Whimsy Tackle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Accelerating Spin
attacks.text: Attach 2 Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon. Then, switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prima Rondo
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Pompous Punch
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Disorderly Flip
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Wish
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dragon Slayer
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Dragon Pokémon, this attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Proclaim the Night
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Simultaneous Peck
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

ability.name: Retreat Aid

cards.name: Assault Vest
text: Any damage done to the Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached to them is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Brigette
text: Search your deck for 1 Basic Pokémon-EX or 3 Basic Pokémon (except for Pokémon-EX) and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Buddy-Buddy Rescue
text: Each player puts a Pokémon from his or her discard pile into his or her hand. (Your opponent chooses first.)

cards.name: Fisherman
text: Put 4 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Float Stone
text: The Pokémon this card is attached to has no Retreat Cost.

cards.name: Super Rod
text: Shuffle 3 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Giovanni's Scheme
text: Choose 1: •Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. •During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
